comment: Bruce Burch is the best prof I've EVER had at KSU. He's a great mentor and person. Whoever said he wasn't a good prof didn't want to work/learn at all. Bruce tells you exactly what to expect and in turn, he rewards those who work hard. He doesn't spoon feed you but he gives you the vital tools necessary to succeed. :)

Bruce says what he means and means what he says. People come to this class and expect to be hand feed when in REALITY you have to "Make A Name For Yourself." I can attribute Bruce and Keith to an ongoing list of opportunities that have spawned from being in this class.

Professor Burch is an amazing teacher, mentor,& person. Obviously the previous post was written by someone who does not understand "Fundamentals" classes cover broad scopes of the topic at hand. Amazing speakers,emails sent out for educational resources,&great lectures = great class. We learned A LOT about Entertainment! Best class I've had so far!

Bruce Burch is a horrendous "professor." True he is an extremely well connected person within the music industry but yelling at students and monotonous guest speakers is not the formula for a good class. None of the speakers had anything to do with another and there was nothing in specific we were supposed to learn. An onslaught of emails got old!!
